"Undoing and Redoing Actions":
"In Character Creation and the Beauty Salon, you can undo your previous action to return to the state you were in before you made it.

・Undo
\u3000Each time you press , one action will be undone, in reverse order.
・Redo
\u3000Each time you press , an undone action will be redone, in the order you previously did them."
